message.content:
cs.CR, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.AI, cs.SE

This paper focuses on improving the resilience of Industrial Control Systems (ICS) against malware propagation through optimal diversification of network resources. Therefore, the most likely arXiv CS sub-category is cs.CR (Cryptography and Security). The paper also deals with network infrastructure and optimization, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture). Additionally, the paper proposes an efficient method to compute an optimal deployment, which involves modeling and simulation, indicating that it could also fit into cs.SY (Systems and Control). The paper also uses vulnerability similarity and measures the improved resilience of the diversified network, which suggests that it could belong to cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) or cs.SE (Software Engineering).
